title: Wukong's Special Taunts and Interactions (Riot Plz)
body:
Okay, so I posted on reddit and twitter and Riot Support sent me here :D

{{champion:62}} Wukong doesn't have a special taunt, not even **one**; I get that he's an older champ, but ain't just adding a couple of quotes is easy? (I get that the answer is no, so....>>)

Furthermore, it seems weird to me because his interactions with other champs are limited to 2 quotes with {{champion:11}} Master Yi -> and Yi is the one doing the interaction.
A bit disappointing, considering {{champion:157}} **Yasuo **laughs about Yi's wuju style,
> "Wuju? Hmph. Never heard of it."

but Wukong shares his methods (and the quote: "Wuju Style") 
Adding the same interaction from Yasuo to Wukong as well is easy, and it seemed just like riot forgot about the wuju-monkey.
pls riot?

replies.body: Yes, The monkey king needs respect

Adding quotes is actually the hardest part of the updating process.

Things like models, effects, mechanics, so on... It's all the same for everyone who plays League. But quotes need to be translated into many different languages, with a different voice actor for each one.

but it's wuju and he's never heard of it

so how would he know wukong has wuju too? :P
